overview: The film features Pavel Novotny (otherwise known as Jan Dvorak) in a variety of gay sexual encounters in sumptuous settings and wonderful locations. Novotny is handsome, athletic and well-endowed. Higgins has chosen a romantic, lyrical style and the production values are very high. The sex scenes are stunning. This certainly sets the standard against which contemporary gay porn films should be measured.
title: The Jan Dvorak Story
